title: Update Failover Vnet
body:
# **PROD**
1. pre-prod-usw1-asr-rsv-01
2. Replicated Items
3. find vm (click into it)
4. Network
5. click edit
6. click SI CORE for simulation (**NON PHI**)
7. change accelerated NEtworking to enabled (test failover settings)
8. change subnet to match source (Prod-core-backend-01(10.193.7.0/24)
9. save
10.
